info.title: OpenAPI schemas for YANG data models -p, , -f, candil-openapi-schemas-generator, ietf-interfaces@2025-10-03.yang, ietf-ip@2025-10-04.yang, ietf-microwave-radio-link@2025-10-04.yang.
info.description: OpenAPI schemas for YANG data models compliant with the NGSI-LD OAS V1.6.1 metamodel according to ETSI GS CIM 009 V1.6.1.

Interface.description:
The list of interfaces on the device

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be Interface.

Name.description:
The name of the interface

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

Description.description:
A textual description of the interface

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

InterfaceType.description:
The type of the interface.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

InterfaceEnabled.description:
This leaf contains the configured state of the interface.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

OperStatus.description:
The current operational state of the interface.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

LastChange.description:
Time the interface entered its current operational state.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

PhysAddress.description:
The interface’s link layer address. For an 802.x interface, this
object normally contains a Media Access Control (MAC) address.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

HigherLayerIf.description:
References to interfaces layered on top of this interface.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

LowerLayerIf.description:
References to interfaces layered underneath this interface.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

Speed.description:
Estimate of the interface’s current bandwidth in bps. For
interfaces that do not vary in bandwidth or for those where no
accurate estimation can be made, this node should contain the
nominal bandwidth. 

Units: bits/second

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

InterfaceStatistics.description:
A collection of interface-related statistics objects.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be InterfaceStatistics.

isPartOf.description: isPartOf Relationship with Entity type Interface.

DiscontinuityTime.description:
System reset time.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

InOctets.description:
Total received bytes.

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

InUnicastPkts.description:
Total received unicast packets.

Reference: RFC 2863: The Interfaces Group MIB - ifHCInUcastPkts

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

InDiscards.description:
Dropped received packets due to buffer overflow.

Reference: RFC 2863: The Interfaces Group MIB - ifInDiscards

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

InErrors.description:
Reception errors.

Reference: RFC 2863: The Interfaces Group MIB - ifInErrors

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

OutOctets.description:
Total transmitted bytes.

Reference: RFC 2863: The Interfaces Group MIB - ifHCOutOctets

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

OutUnicastPkts.description:
Total transmitted unicast packets.

Reference: RFC 2863: The Interfaces Group MIB - ifHCOutUcastPkts

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

OutDiscards.description:
Dropped transmitted packets due to buffer overflow.

Reference: RFC 2863: The Interfaces Group MIB - ifOutDiscards

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

OutErrors.description:
Transmission errors.

Reference: RFC 2863: The Interfaces Group MIB - ifOutErrors

YANG module: ietf-interfaces.yang

InterfaceIpv4.description:
Parameters for the IPv4 address family.

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be InterfaceIpv4.

isPartOf.description: isPartOf Relationship with Entity type Interface.

InterfaceIpv4Enabled.description:
Controls whether IPv4 is enabled on this interface.

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

Forwarding.description:
Controls IPv4 packet forwarding of datagrams received by,
but not addressed to, this interface. IPv4 routers forward
datagrams. IPv4 hosts do not (except those source-routed via
the host).

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

Mtu.description:
The size, in byte, of the largest IPv4 packet that the interface
will send and receive.

Reference: RFC 791: Internet Protocol

Units: octets

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

InterfaceIpv4Address.description:
The list of IPv4 addresses on the interface.

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be InterfaceIpv4Address.

isPartOf.description: isPartOf Relationship with Entity type InterfaceIpv4.

Ip.description:
The IPv4 address on the interface.

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

SubnetPrefixLength.description:
The length of the subnet prefix.

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

SubnetNetmask.description:
The subnet specified as a netmask.

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

Origin.description:
The origin of this address.

YANG module: ietf-ip.yang

CarrierTerminations.description:
A list of references to carrier terminations included in the
radio link terminal.

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

CarrierId.description:
ID of the carrier.

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

TxEnabled.description:
Disables (false) or enables (true) the transmitter. Only
applicable when the interface is enabled (interface:enabled=true).

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

TxOperStatus.description:
Shows the operative status of the transmitter.

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

TxFrequency.description:
Selected transmitter frequency.

Units: kHz

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

FreqOrDistanceRxFrequency.description:
Selected receiver frequency.

Units: kHz

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

FreqOrDistanceDuplexDistance.description:
Distance between transmitter and receiver frequencies.

Units: kHz

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

ChannelSeparation.description:
The amount of bandwidth allocated to a carrier.

Reference: ETSI EN 302 217-1

Units: kHz

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

ActualTransmittedLevel.description:
Actual transmitted power level (0.1 dBm resolution).

Reference: ETSI EN 301 129

Units: dBm

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

ActualReceivedLevel.description:
Actual received power level (0.1 dBm resolution).

Reference: ETSI EN 301 129

Units: dBm

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

CodingModulationModeSingle.description:
A single modulation order only.

Reference: ETSI EN 302 217-1

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be CodingModulationModeSingle.

isPartOf.description: isPartOf Relationship with Entity type CodingModulationMode.

SelectedCm.description:
Selected the single coding/modulation.

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

CodingModulationModeAdaptive.description:
Adaptive coding/modulation.

Reference: ETSI EN 302 217-1

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be CodingModulationModeAdaptive.

isPartOf.description: isPartOf Relationship with Entity type CodingModulationMode.

SelectedMinAcm.description:
Selected minimum coding/modulation.

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

SelectedMaxAcm.description:
Selected maximum coding/modulation

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

ActualSnir.description:
Actual signal to noise plus the interference ratio (0.1 dB).

Units: dB

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

InterfaceCapabilities.description:
Capabilities of the installed equipment.

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be InterfaceCapabilities.

isPartOf.description: isPartOf Relationship with Entity type Interface.

MinTxFrequency.description:
Minimum Tx frequency possible to use.

Units: kHz

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

MaxTxFrequency.description:
Maximum Tx frequency possible to use.

Units: kHz

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

MinRxFrequency.description:
Minimum Rx frequency possible to use.

Units: kHz

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

MaxRxFrequency.description:
Maximum Tx frequency possible to use.

Units: kHz

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

InterfaceRadioPerformanceStatistics.description:
ETSI EN 301 129 radio physical interface statistics relevant
for a carrier termination.

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be InterfaceRadioPerformanceStatistics.

isPartOf.description: isPartOf Relationship with Entity type Interface.

MinRltm.description:
Minimum received power level.

Reference: ETSI EN 301 129

Units: dBm

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

MaxRltm.description:
Maximum received power level.

Reference: ETSI EN 301 129

Units: dBm

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

MinTltm.description:
Minimum transmitted power level.

Reference: ETSI EN 301 129

Units: dBm

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

MaxTltm.description:
Maximum transmitted power level.

Reference: ETSI EN 301 129

Units: dBm

YANG module: ietf-microwave-radio-link.yang

YANGIdentity.description: A representation schema for YANG Identities.

type.description: NGSI-LD Entity identifier. It has to be YANGIdentity.

YANGIdentityDescription.description: NGSI-LD Relationship Type. YANG Identity description.

YANGIdentityIdentifier.description: NGSI-LD Property Type. YANG Identity identifier.

YANGIdentityNamespace.description: NGSI-LD Property Type. YANG Identity namespace.

YANGIdentityBroader.description: NGSI-LD Relationship Type. The relationship to the base YANG Identity.

IsPartOf.description: NGSI-LD Relationship Type. A hierarchical relationship.
